Card.Name: Manga Ryu-Ran
Card.Card_Text: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Cannot be Special Summoned unless you control a face-up "Toon World". Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) by Tributing the same number of monsters needed for a Tribute Summon (normally 2). This card cannot attack the turn it is Special Summoned. You must pay 500 Life Points to declare an attack with this monster. If "Toon World" on the field is destroyed, destroy this card. This card can attack your opponent directly, unless they control a Toon Monster. If they do control one, this card must target a Toon Monster for its attacks.

Card.Name: Toon Mermaid
Card.Card_Text: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Cannot be Special Summoned unless you control a face-up "Toon World". Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) by Tributing the same number of monsters needed for a Tribute Summon (normally 0). This card cannot attack the turn it is Special Summoned. You must pay 500 Life Points to declare an attack with this monster. If "Toon World" on the field is destroyed, destroy this card. This card can attack your opponent directly, unless they control a Toon Monster. If they do control one, this card must target a Toon Monster for its attacks.

Card.Name: Toon Summoned Skull
Card.Card_Text:
(This card is always treated as an "Archfiend" card.)
Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Cannot be Special Summoned unless you control "Toon World". Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) by Tributing the same number of monsters needed for a Tribute Summon (normally 1). This card cannot attack the turn it is Special Summoned. You must pay 500 Life Points to declare an attack with this monster. If "Toon World" on the field is destroyed, destroy this card. This card can attack your opponent directly, unless they control a Toon Monster. If they do control one, this card must target a Toon Monster for its attacks.

Card.Name: Dark-Eyes Illusionist
Card.Card_Text: FLIP: Target 1 monster on the field; it cannot attack while this card is face-up on the field.

Card.Name: Relinquished
Card.Card_Text: You can Ritual Summon this card with "Black Illusion Ritual". Once per turn: You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; equip that target to this card. (You can only equip 1 monster at a time to this card with this effect.) This card's ATK and DEF become equal to that equipped monster's. If this card would be destroyed by battle, destroy that equipped monster instead. While equipped with that monster, any battle damage you take from battles involving this card inflicts equal effect damage to your opponent.

Card.Name: Jigen Bakudan
Card.Card_Text: FLIP: After this card is flipped, offer it as a Tribute during your Standby Phase to destroy all monsters on your side of the field and inflict Direct Damage equal to half of the total ATK of the destroyed cards (excluding this monster) to your opponent's Life Points.

Card.Name: Thousand-Eyes Idol
Card.Card_Text: A wicked entity that controls the hearts of men, its thousand eyes are able to see and expand the negative influences in an individual's soul.

Card.Name: Thousand-Eyes Restrict
Card.Card_Text:
"Relinquished" + "Thousand-Eyes Idol"
Other monsters cannot change their battle position or attack. Once per turn, you can equip 1 monster your opponent controls to this card (max 1). This card's ATK and DEF become the same as the equipped monster's. If this card would be destroyed by battle, the equipped monster is destroyed instead.

Card.Name: Steel Ogre Grotto #2
Card.Card_Text: A mechanized iron doll with tremendous strength.

Card.Name: Blast Sphere
Card.Card_Text: If this face-down Defense Position card was attacked by an opponent's monster, before damage calculation: Equip this card to the attacking monster. Then, during your opponent's next Standby Phase: Destroy the monster this card is equipped to, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the ATK the destroyed monster had on the field.

Card.Name: Hyozanryu
Card.Card_Text: A dragon created from a massibe diamond that sparkles with blinding light.

Card.Name: Alpha The Magnet Warrior
Card.Card_Text: Alpha, Beta, and Gamma meld as one to form a powerful monster.

Card.Name: Legion the Fiend Jester
Card.Card_Text: During your Main Phase, you can Tribute Summon 1 Spellcaster-Type monster in face-up Attack Position, in addition to your Normal Summon/Set. (You can only gain this effect once per turn.) If this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard: You can add 1 Spellcaster-Type Normal Monster from your Deck or Graveyard to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Legion the Fiend Jester" once per turn.

Card.Name: Invitation to a Dark Sleep
Card.Card_Text: When this monster is summoned (excluding Special Summon), select 1 of your opponent's monsters. As long as this card remains face-up on the field, the selected monster cannot attack.

Card.Name: Lord of D.
Card.Card_Text: Dragon-Type monsters on the field cannot be targeted by card effects.

Card.Name: Red-Eyes Black Metal Dragon
Card.Card_Text: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your Deck) by Tributing "Red-Eyes B. Dragon" equipped with "Metalmorph".

Card.Name: Barrel Dragon
Card.Card_Text: Once per turn: You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; toss a coin 3 times and destroy it if at least 2 of the results are Heads.

Card.Name: Hannibal Necromancer
Card.Card_Text: If this card is Normal Summoned: Place 1 Spell Counter on it (max. 1). You can remove 1 Spell Counter from this card, then target 1 face-up Trap Card on the field; destroy that target.

Card.Name: Panther Warrior
Card.Card_Text: This card cannot declare an attack unless you Tribute 1 monster.

Card.Name: Three-Headed Geedo
Card.Card_Text: A three-headed nocturnal monster that is absolutely ruthless when fighting.

Card.Name: Gazelle the King of Mythical Beasts
Card.Card_Text: This monster moves so fast that it looks like an illusion to mortal eyes.

Card.Name: Stone Statue of the Aztecs
Card.Card_Text: Double any Battle Damage your opponent takes when they attack this monster.

Card.Name: Berfomet
Card.Card_Text: When this card is Normal or Flip Summoned: You can add 1 "Gazelle the King of Mythical Beasts" from your Deck to your hand.

Card.Name: Chimera the Flying Mythical Beast
Card.Card_Text:
"Gazelle the King of Mythical Beasts" + "Berfomet"
(This card is always treated as a "Phantom Beast" card.)
When this card is destroyed: You can target 1 "Berfomet" or 1 "Gazelle the King of Mythical Beasts" in your Graveyard; Special Summon that target.

Card.Name: Gear Golem the Moving Fortress
Card.Card_Text: Once per turn, during your Main Phase 1: You can pay 800 Life Points; this card can attack your opponent directly this turn.

Card.Name: Jinzo
Card.Card_Text: Trap Cards, and their effects on the field, cannot be activated. Negate all Trap Card effects on the field.

Card.Name: Swordsman of Landstar
Card.Card_Text: An amateur with a sword, this fairy warrior relies on its mysterious powers.

Card.Name: Cyber Raider
Card.Card_Text:
When this card is Summoned: Activate 1 of these effects.
●Target 1 Equip Card equipped to a monster on the field; destroy that target.
●Target 1 Equip Card equipped to a monster on the field; equip that target to this card.

Card.Name: The Fiend Megacyber
Card.Card_Text: If your opponent controls at least 2 more monsters than you do, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand).

Card.Name: Reflect Bounder
Card.Card_Text: Before damage calculation, if this card is being attacked by an opponent's monster, and was in face-up Attack Position at the start of the Damage Step: Inflict damage to your opponent equal to the attacking monster's ATK. If you do, after damage calculation: Destroy this card.

Card.Name: Beta The Magnet Warrior
Card.Card_Text: Alpha, Beta, and Gamma meld as one to form a powerful monster.

Card.Name: Big Shield Gardna
Card.Card_Text: During either player's turn, when this face-down card (and no other cards) is targeted by a Spell Card: Change this card to face-up Defense Position, and if you do, negate the Spell Card's activation. If this card is attacked, change it to Attack Position at the end of the Damage Step.

Card.Name: Dark Magician Girl
Card.Card_Text: This card gains 300 ATK for every "Dark Magician" or "Magician of Black Chaos" in either player's Graveyard.

Card.Name: Alligator's Sword
Card.Card_Text: 'ey, dis mighty lissard man can swing his sword so fast, dat it's more dan da speed a sound!

Card.Name: Insect Queen
Card.Card_Text: Cannot declare an attack unless you Tribute 1 monster. This card gains 200 ATK for each Insect-Type monster on the field. During the End Phase, if this card destroyed an opponent's monster by battle this turn: Special Summon 1 "Insect Monster Token" (Insect-Type/EARTH/Level 1/ATK 100/DEF 100) in Attack Position.

Card.Name: Parasite Paracide
Card.Card_Text: FLIP: Put this card face-up in your opponent's Deck and shuffle it. When your opponent draws this card, it is Special Summoned to their side of the field in face-up Defense Position, and inflicts 1000 damage to them. Then, while this card is face-up on the field, all monsters your opponent controls become Insect-Type monsters.

Card.Name: Skull-Mark Ladybug
Card.Card_Text: When this card is sent to the Graveyard, increase your Life Points by 1000 points.

Card.Name: Little-Winguard
Card.Card_Text: Once per turn, during your End Phase: You can change the battle position of this card.

Card.Name: Pinch Hopper
Card.Card_Text: When this card you control is sent to your Graveyard: You can Special Summon 1 Insect-Type Monster from your hand.

Card.Name: Blue-Eyes Toon Dragon
Card.Card_Text: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) by Tributing 2 monsters, while you control "Toon World". Cannot attack the turn it is Special Summoned. You must pay 500 LP to declare an attack with this monster. If "Toon World" on the field is destroyed, destroy this card. Can attack your opponent directly, unless they control a Toon monster, in which case this card must target a Toon monster for its attacks.

Card.Name: Sword Hunter
Card.Card_Text:
At the end of the Battle Phase, if this card destroyed a monster(s) by battle and sent it to the Graveyard this Battle Phase: Equip all those monsters from the Graveyard to this card as an Equip Spell Card(s) with this effect.
●The equipped monster gains 200 ATK.

Card.Name: Drill Bug
Card.Card_Text: When this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points, you can select 1 "Parasite Paracide" card from your Deck, shuffle the Deck, and place "Parasite Paracide" on top of the Deck.

Card.Name: Deepsea Warrior
Card.Card_Text: As long as "Umi" is face-up on the field, this card is unaffected by any Spell Cards.

Card.Name: Bite Shoes
Card.Card_Text: FLIP: Change the Attack or Defense Position of 1 face-up monster on the field. The card must remain face-up.

Card.Name: Spikebot
Card.Card_Text: A mechanical soldier created by a wicked sorcerer, it attacks with the two steel balls attached to its arms.

Card.Name: Satellite Cannon
Card.Card_Text: This card cannot be destroyed by battle with a Level 7 or lower monster. During each of your End Phases: This card gains 1000 ATK. If this card attacks, this increased ATK returns to 0, after damage calculation.

Card.Name: The Last Warrior from Another Planet
Card.Card_Text:
"Zombyra the Dark" + "Maryokutai"
When this card is Special Summoned, destroy all monsters on your side of the field except this card. As long as this card remains face-up on the field, neither player can Normal Summon, Flip Summon or Special Summon any monster.

Card.Name: Dunames Dark Witch
Card.Card_Text: Even when all odds are against this brave fairy, she will press onwards in battle and never retreat.

Card.Name: Garnecia Elefantis
Card.Card_Text: A monster so heavy that each step rocks the earth.

Card.Name: Total Defense Shogun
Card.Card_Text: This card is changed to Defense Position when it is Normal Summoned or Flip Summoned successfully. This card can attack while it is in Defense Position. If this card attacks while in Defense Position, apply the ATK of this card for damage calculation.

Card.Name: Beast of Talwar
Card.Card_Text:
Only the master of the sword among Fiend-Type monsters is permitted to hold the Talwar.

(This card is always treated as an "Archfiend" card.)

Card.Name: Cyber-Tech Alligator
Card.Card_Text: Originally a pterodactyl, he was viciously attacked by a dragon. Using the newest technologies, his keeper saved him from near-fatal wounds and brought him back as a powerful Cyborg.

Card.Name: Gamma The Magnet Warrior
Card.Card_Text: Alpha, Beta, and Gamma meld as one to form a powerful monster.

Card.Name: Time Machine
Card.Card_Text: When exactly 1 monster is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: Special Summon that monster to the same side of the field it was on, in the same battle position it was in when destroyed.

Card.Name: Copycat
Card.Card_Text: When this card is Summoned: Target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; this card's ATK and DEF become equal to that monster's original ATK and DEF.

Card.Name: Toon World
Card.Card_Text: Activate this card by paying 1000 LP.

Card.Name: Gorgon's Eye
Card.Card_Text: Until the end of this turn, all effects of Defense Position monsters are negated.

Card.Name: Mimicat
Card.Card_Text: If you control "Toon World" and a Toon monster: Target 1 card in your opponent's Graveyard; if it is a monster, Special Summon it to your side of the field, or if it is a Spell/Trap Card, Set it to your side of the field. You can only activate 1 "Mimicat" per turn.

Card.Name: Black Illusion Ritual
Card.Card_Text: This card is used to Ritual Summon "Relinquished". You must also Tribute monsters from your hand or field whose total Levels equal 1 or more.

Card.Name: Brain Control
Card.Card_Text: Pay 800 LP, then target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; take control of that target until the End Phase.

Card.Name: Negate Attack
Card.Card_Text: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Target the attacking monster; negate the attack, then end the Battle Phase.

Card.Name: Multiply
Card.Card_Text: Tribute 1 face-up "Kuriboh"; Special Summon as many "Kuriboh Tokens" (Fiend-Type/DARK/Level 1/ATK 300/DEF 200) as possible, in Defense Position. These Tokens cannot be Tributed for a Tribute Summon.

Card.Name: 7 Completed
Card.Card_Text: Activate this card by choosing ATK or DEF; equip only to a Machine-Type monster. It gains 700 ATK or DEF, depending on the choice.

Card.Name: Lightforce Sword
Card.Card_Text: Banish 1 random card from your opponent's hand, face-down. During your opponent's 4th Standby Phase after this card's activation, return that card to their hand.

Card.Name: The Flute of Summoning Dragon
Card.Card_Text: Special Summon up to 2 Dragon-Type monsters from your hand. "Lord of D." must be on the field to activate and to resolve this effect.

Card.Name: Shield & Sword
Card.Card_Text: Switch the original ATK and DEF of all face-up monsters currently on the field, until the End Phase.

Card.Name: Graceful Charity
Card.Card_Text: Draw 3 cards, then discard 2 cards.

Card.Name: Chain Destruction
Card.Card_Text: When a monster(s) with 2000 or less ATK is Summoned: Target 1 of them; destroy all cards with that name in its controller's hand and Main Deck.

Card.Name: Mesmeric Control
Card.Card_Text: During your opponent's next turn after you activate this card, your opponent cannot change the battle positions of monsters, except with a card effect.

Card.Name: Graceful Dice
Card.Card_Text: Roll a six-sided die. All monsters you currently control gain ATK and DEF equal to the result x 100, until the End Phase.

Card.Name: Skull Dice
Card.Card_Text: Roll a six-sided die. All monsters your opponent currently controls lose ATK and DEF equal to the result x 100, until the End Phase.

Card.Name: Mind Control
Card.Card_Text: Target 1 monster your opponent controls; until the End Phase, take control of that target, but it cannot declare an attack or be Tributed.

Card.Name: Scapegoat
Card.Card_Text: Special Summon 4 "Sheep Tokens" (Beast-Type/EARTH/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0) in Defense Position. These Tokens cannot be Tributed for a Tribute Summon. You cannot Summon other monsters the turn you activate this card (but you can Normal Set).

Card.Name: Amplifier
Card.Card_Text: You can only equip this card to "Jinzo". As long as this card is equipped, the effects of Trap Cards controlled by the equipped monster's controller are not negated by the effect of the equipped monster. When this card is removed from the field, the equipped monster is destroyed. This card's activation and effect cannot be negated by any other card.

Card.Name: Roulette Spider
Card.Card_Text:
When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Roll a six-sided die and apply the result.
1: Halve your LP.
2: Make that attack a direct attack.
3: Choose 1 monster you control, change the attack target to it, and perform damage calculation.
4: Choose 1 other monster your opponent controls, change the attack target to it, and perform damage calculation.
5: Negate the attack, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to that monster's ATK.
6: Destroy that opponent's monster.

Card.Name: Card Destruction
Card.Card_Text: Each player discards their entire hand, then draws the same number of cards they discarded.

Card.Name: Dark Renewal
Card.Card_Text: When your opponent Normal or Special Summons a monster(s): Target 1 of those monsters and 1 Spellcaster-Type monster you control; send both monsters to the Graveyard, then you can Special Summon 1 DARK Spellcaster-Type monster from your Deck or Graveyard.

Card.Name: Tragedy
Card.Card_Text: When a face-up Attack Position monster(s) your opponent controls is changed to face-up Defense Position: Destroy all Defense Position monsters your opponent controls.

Card.Name: Mystical Refpanel
Card.Card_Text: Activate only when a Spell Card that targets 1 player is activated. The effect of that Spell Card is applied to the other player instead.

Card.Name: Ectoplasmer
Card.Card_Text: Once per turn, during each player's End Phase: The turn player must Tribute 1 face-up monster, and if they do, inflict damage to their opponent equal to half the original ATK of the Tributed monster.

Card.Name: Dark Magic Curtain
Card.Card_Text: Pay half your LP; Special Summon 1 "Dark Magician" from your Deck. You cannot Summon other monsters the turn you activate this card (but you can Set).

Card.Name: Anti-Magic Arrows
Card.Card_Text: At the start of the Battle Phase: For the rest of this turn after this card resolves, Spell/Trap Cards, and their effects, cannot be activated. Cards and effects cannot be activated in response to this card's activation.

Card.Name: Insect Barrier
Card.Card_Text: Insect-Type monsters your opponent controls cannot declare an attack.

Card.Name: Magical Arm Shield
Card.Card_Text: When your opponent declares an attack while you control a monster: Target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls, except the attacking monster; take control of that target until the end of the Battle Phase, and if you do, it is attacked instead, and you proceed to damage calculation.

Card.Name: Fissure
Card.Card_Text: Destroy the 1 face-up monster your opponent controls that has the lowest ATK (your choice, if tied).

Card.Name: Trap Hole
Card.Card_Text: When your opponent Normal or Flip Summons 1 monster with 1000 or more ATK: Target that monster; destroy that target.

Card.Name: Polymerization
Card.Card_Text: Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or your side of the field as Fusion Materials.

Card.Name: Remove Trap
Card.Card_Text: Select 1 face-up Trap Card on the field and destroy it.

Card.Name: Two-Pronged Attack
Card.Card_Text: Select and destroy 2 of your monsters and 1 of your opponent's monsters.

Card.Name: Blue Medicine
Card.Card_Text: Gain 400 Life Points.

Card.Name: Raimei
Card.Card_Text: Decrease your opponent's Life Points by 300 points.

Card.Name: Monster Reborn
Card.Card_Text: Target 1 monster in either player's Graveyard; Special Summon it.

Card.Name: De-Spell
Card.Card_Text: Select 1 Spell Card on the field and destroy it. If the selected card is Set, pick up and see the card. If it is a Spell Card, it is destroyed. If it is a Trap Card, return it to its original position.

Card.Name: Pot of Greed
Card.Card_Text: Draw 2 cards.

Card.Name: Gravedigger Ghoul
Card.Card_Text: Select 2 Monster Cards from your opponent's Graveyard. These Monster Cards are removed from play for the remainder of the Duel.

Card.Name: Burning Spear
Card.Card_Text: A FIRE monster equipped with this card increases its ATK by 400 points and decreases its DEF by 200 points.

Card.Name: Gust Fan
Card.Card_Text: A WIND monster equipped with this card increases its ATK by 400 points and decreases its DEF by 200 points.

Card.Name: The Inexperienced Spy
Card.Card_Text: Select and see 1 card in your opponent's hand.

Card.Name: Reinforcements
Card.Card_Text: Target face-up monster gains 500 ATK until the End Phase.

Card.Name: Castle Walls
Card.Card_Text: Increase a selected monster's DEF by 500 points during the turn this card is activated.

Card.Name: Ultimate Offering
Card.Card_Text: During your Main Phase or your opponent's Battle Phase: You can pay 500 Life Points; immediately after this effect resolves, Normal Summon/Set 1 monster.

Card.Name: Ancient Telescope
Card.Card_Text: See the top 5 cards of your opponent's Deck. Return the cards to the Deck in the same order.

Card.Name: White Hole
Card.Card_Text: Activate only when your opponent activates "Dark Hole". The monsters you control are not destroyed.

Card.Name: Call of the Grave
Card.Card_Text: When your opponent activates "Monster Reborn": Negate its effect.

Card.Name: Anti Raigeki
Card.Card_Text: When your opponent activates "Raigeki", all of your opponent's monsters are destroyed in place of your own.

Card.Name: Tribute to The Doomed
Card.Card_Text: Discard 1 card, then target 1 monster on the field; destroy it.

Card.Name: Soul Release
Card.Card_Text: Target up to 5 cards in any Graveyard(s); banish them.

Card.Name: The Cheerful Coffin
Card.Card_Text: Discard up to 3 Monster Cards from your hand to the Graveyard.

Card.Name: Call of Darkness
Card.Card_Text: All monsters restored with "Monster Reborn" are sent to the Graveyard. "Monster Reborn" also cannot be played as long as this card remains on the field.

Card.Name: Change of Heart
Card.Card_Text: Target 1 monster your opponent controls; take control of it until the End Phase.

Card.Name: Solemn Judgment
Card.Card_Text: When a monster would be Summoned, OR a Spell/Trap Card is activated: Pay half your Life Points; negate the Summon or activation, and if you do, destroy that card.

Card.Name: Magic Jammer
Card.Card_Text: When a Spell Card is activated: Discard 1 card; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it.

Card.Name: Seven Tools of the Bandit
Card.Card_Text: When a Trap Card is activated: Pay 1000 LP; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it.

Card.Name: Horn of Heaven
Card.Card_Text: When a monster(s) would be Summoned: Tribute 1 monster; negate the Summon, and if you do, destroy that monster(s).

Card.Name: Just Desserts
Card.Card_Text: Inflict 500 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points for each monster on your opponent's side of the field.

Card.Name: Royal Decree
Card.Card_Text: Negate all other Trap Card effects on the field.

Card.Name: Last Day of Witch
Card.Card_Text: Destroy all face-up Spellcaster-Type monsters on the field.

Card.Name: Exile of the Wicked
Card.Card_Text: Destroy all face-up Fiend-Type monsters on the field.

Card.Name: Magical Thorn
Card.Card_Text: When your opponent's card(s) in their hand are discarded to the Graveyard, inflict 500 points of damage to their Life Points for each card that was discarded.

Card.Name: Restructer Revolution
Card.Card_Text: Inflict 200 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points for each card in your opponent's hand.

Card.Name: Fusion Sage
Card.Card_Text: Add 1 "Polymerization" card from your Deck to your hand. Then shuffle your Deck.

Card.Name: Sword of Deep-Seated
Card.Card_Text: A Monster Card equipped with this card increases its ATK and DEF by 500 points. When this card is sent to the Graveyard, place it on top of your Deck.

Card.Name: Block Attack
Card.Card_Text: Select 1 face-up Attack Position monster on your opponent's side of the field and change it to Defense Position.

Card.Name: The Unhappy Maiden
Card.Card_Text: When this card is sent to the Graveyard as a result of battle, the Battle Phase for that turn ends immediately.

Card.Name: Robbin' Goblin
Card.Card_Text: Each time a monster you control inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent, your opponent discards 1 random card.

Card.Name: Germ Infection
Card.Card_Text: The ATK of a non Machine-Type monster equipped with this card is decreased by 300 points at each of its Standby Phases.

Card.Name: Paralyzing Potion
Card.Card_Text: A non Machine-Type monster equipped with this card cannot attack.

Card.Name: The Stern Mystic
Card.Card_Text: FLIP: All face-down cards on the field are turned face-up, and then returned to their original positions. No card effects are activated when cards are turned face-up.

Card.Name: Wall of Illusion
Card.Card_Text: If this card is attacked by a monster, after damage calculation: Return that monster to the hand.

Card.Name: Neo the Magic Swordsman
Card.Card_Text: A dimensional drifter who not only practices sorcery, but is also a sword and martial arts master.

Card.Name: Baron of the Fiend Sword
Card.Card_Text: An aristocrat who wields a sword possessed by a malicious spirit that preys on the weak.

Card.Name: Man-Eating Treasure Chest
Card.Card_Text: A monster disguised as a treasure chest that is known to attack the unwary adventurer.

Card.Name: Sorcerer of the Doomed
Card.Card_Text: A slave of the dark arts, this sorcerer is a master of life-extinguishing spells.

Card.Name: Last Will
Card.Card_Text: If a monster on your side of the field was sent to your Graveyard this turn, you can Special Summon 1 monster with an ATK of 1500 points or less from your Deck once during this turn. Then shuffle your Deck.

Card.Name: Waboku
Card.Card_Text: You take no battle damage from your opponent's monsters this turn. Your monsters cannot be destroyed by battle this turn.

Card.Name: Mirror Force
Card.Card_Text: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Destroy all Attack Position monsters your opponent controls.

Card.Name: Ring of Magnetism
Card.Card_Text: You can only equip this card to a monster on your side of the field. Decrease the ATK and DEF of a monster equipped with this card by 500 points. In addition, all the monsters on your opponent's side of the field can only attack the monster equipped with this card, if they attack.

Card.Name: Share the Pain
Card.Card_Text: Tribute 1 monster; make your opponent Tribute 1 monster (for no effect).

Card.Name: Stim-Pack
Card.Card_Text: The equipped monster gains 700 ATK. During each of your Standby Phases, the equipped monster loses 200 ATK.

Card.Name: Heavy Storm
Card.Card_Text: Destroy all Spell and Trap Cards on the field.

Card.Name: Gryphon Wing
Card.Card_Text: When your opponent activates "Harpie's Feather Duster": Negate its effect, and if you do, destroy all Spell and Trap Cards your opponent controls.

Card.Name: Gravekeeper's Servant
Card.Card_Text: Unless your opponent sends 1 card from the top of his/her Deck to the Graveyard, he/she cannot declare an attack.

Card.Name: Curse of Fiend
Card.Card_Text: Changes the battle positions of all Attack Position monsters on the field to Defense Position and vice-versa. These positions cannot be changed during the turn this card is activated except by the effect of a Spell, Trap or Effect Monster Card. You can activate this card only during your Standby Phase.

Card.Name: Upstart Goblin
Card.Card_Text: Draw 1 card, then your opponent gains 1000 Life Points.

Card.Name: Toll
Card.Card_Text: Each player must pay 500 Life Points to declare an attack.

Card.Name: Final Destiny
Card.Card_Text: Discard 5 cards from your hand. Destroy all cards on the field.

Card.Name: Snatch Steal
Card.Card_Text: Equip only to a monster your opponent controls. Take control of the equipped monster. During each of your opponent's Standby Phases: They gain 1000 Life Points.

Card.Name: Chorus of Sanctuary
Card.Card_Text: Increase the DEF of all Defense Position monsters by 500 points.

Card.Name: Confiscation
Card.Card_Text: Pay 1000 Life Points. Look at your opponent's hand, select 1 card in it and discard that card.

Card.Name: Delinquent Duo
Card.Card_Text: Pay 1000 Life Points. Your opponent randomly selects and discards 1 card from his/her hand and then selects and discards another card from his/her hand.

Card.Name: Darkness Approaches
Card.Card_Text: Discard 2 cards from your hand. Select 1 face-up monster and flip it face-down, but do not change its battle position.

Card.Name: Fairy's Hand Mirror
Card.Card_Text: When your opponent activates a Spell Card that targets exactly 1 monster (and no other cards) on the field: Target another card that would be an appropriate target; that Spell now targets the new target.

Card.Name: Tailor of the Fickle
Card.Card_Text: Switch 1 Equip Card equipped to a monster to another correct target.

Card.Name: Rush Recklessly
Card.Card_Text: Target 1 face-up monster on the field; it gains 700 ATK until the end of this turn.

Card.Name: The Reliable Guardian
Card.Card_Text: Increase 1 face-up monster's DEF by 700 points until the end of this turn.

Card.Name: The Forceful Sentry
Card.Card_Text: Look at your opponent's hand. Select 1 card among them and return it to his/her Deck. The Deck is then shuffled.

Card.Name: Chain Energy
Card.Card_Text: Each player must pay 500 Life Points per card to Normal Summon, Special Summon, Set or activate cards from his/her respective hand.

Card.Name: Mystical Space Typhoon
Card.Card_Text: Target 1 Spell/Trap Card on the field; destroy that target.

Card.Name: Giant Trunade
Card.Card_Text: Return all Spell and Trap Cards on the field to the hand.

Card.Name: Painful Choice
Card.Card_Text: Select 5 cards from your Deck and show them to your opponent. Your opponent selects 1 card among them. Add that card to your hand and discard the remaining cards to the Graveyard.

Card.Name: Snake Fang
Card.Card_Text: Decrease 1 selected monster's DEF by 500 points during the turn this card is activated.

Card.Name: Cyber Jar
Card.Card_Text: FLIP: Destroy all monsters on the field, then both players reveal the top 5 cards from their Decks, then Special Summon all revealed Level 4 or lower monsters in face-up Attack Position or face-down Defense Position, also add any remaining cards to their hand. (If either player has less than 5 cards in their Deck, reveal as many as possible.)

Card.Name: Banisher of the Light
Card.Card_Text: Any card sent to the Graveyard is banished instead.

Card.Name: Giant Rat
Card.Card_Text: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: You can Special Summon 1 EARTH monster with 1500 or less ATK from your Deck, in Attack Position.

Card.Name: Senju of the Thousand Hands
Card.Card_Text: When this card is Normal or Flip Summoned: You can add 1 Ritual Monster from your Deck to your hand.

Card.Name: UFO Turtle
Card.Card_Text: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: You can Special Summon 1 FIRE monster with 1500 or less ATK from your Deck, in face-up Attack Position.

Card.Name: Flash Assailant
Card.Card_Text: Decrease the ATK and DEF of this card by 400 points for each card in your hand.

Card.Name: Karate Man
Card.Card_Text: You can double the original ATK of this card once per turn. If you used this effect, destroy this card during the End Phase.

Card.Name: Dark Zebra
Card.Card_Text: If this is the only card in your control during your Standby Phase, it is automatically placed in Defense Position. You cannot change the position of this card during the same turn.

Card.Name: Giant Germ
Card.Card_Text: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: Inflict 500 damage to your opponent, then you can Special Summon any number of "Giant Germs" from your Deck in face-up Attack Position.

Card.Name: Nimble Momonga
Card.Card_Text: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: Gain 1000 Life Points, then you can Special Summon any number of "Nimble Momongas" from your Deck in face-down Defense Position.

Card.Name: Spear Cretin
Card.Card_Text: FLIP: When this card is sent to the Graveyard after being flipped, each player selects 1 monster from their Graveyard, and Special Summons it in face-up Attack Position or face-down Defense Position.

Card.Name: Shining Angel
Card.Card_Text: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: You can Special Summon 1 LIGHT monster with 1500 or less ATK from your Deck, in face-up Attack Position.

Card.Name: Boar Soldier
Card.Card_Text: This card can only be summoned by a Flip Summon. If summoned by a Normal Summon, the card is destroyed. If your opponent has 1 or more monsters under his/her control, the ATK of this card is decreased by 1000 points.

Card.Name: Mother Grizzly
Card.Card_Text: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: You can Special Summon 1 WATER monster with 1500 or less ATK from your Deck, in face-up Attack Position.

Card.Name: Flying Kamakiri #1
Card.Card_Text: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: You can Special Summon 1 WIND monster with 1500 or less ATK from your Deck, in face-up Attack Position.

Card.Name: Ceremonial Bell
Card.Card_Text: As long as this card remains face-up on the field, both players must show their respective hands.

Card.Name: Sonic Bird
Card.Card_Text: When this card is Normal or Flip Summoned, you can add 1 Ritual Spell Card from your Deck to your hand.

Card.Name: Mystic Tomato
Card.Card_Text: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: You can Special Summon 1 DARK monster with 1500 or less ATK from your Deck, in face-up Attack Position.

Card.Name: Kotodama
Card.Card_Text: If there are face-up monsters with the same name on the field, destroy those monsters. (If a monster is Summoned or flipped-face up that has the same name as a monster that is already face-up on the field, the new face-up monster is destroyed. If they are Summoned or flipped face-up at the same time, they are all destroyed.)

Card.Name: Gaia Power
Card.Card_Text: Increase the ATK of all EARTH monsters by 500 points and decrease their DEF by 400 points.

Card.Name: Umiiruka
Card.Card_Text: Increase the ATK of all WATER monsters by 500 points and decrease their DEF by 400 points.

Card.Name: Molten Destruction
Card.Card_Text: Increase the ATK of all FIRE monsters by 500 points and decrease their DEF by 400 points.

Card.Name: Rising Air Current
Card.Card_Text: Increase the ATK of all WIND monsters by 500 points and decrease their DEF by 400 points.

Card.Name: Luminous Spark
Card.Card_Text: Increase the ATK of all LIGHT monsters by 500 points and decrease their DEF by 400 points.

Card.Name: Mystic Plasma Zone
Card.Card_Text: Increase the ATK of all DARK monsters by 500 points and decrease their DEF by 400 points.

Card.Name: Messenger of Peace
Card.Card_Text: Monsters with 1500 or more ATK cannot declare an attack. During each of your Standby Phases, pay 100 Life Points or destroy this card.

Card.Name: Michizure
Card.Card_Text: Activate only when a monster is sent from the field to your Graveyard. Select and destroy 1 monster on the field. (You can activate this card during the Damage Step.)

Card.Name: Gust
Card.Card_Text: You can activate this card when 1 or more of your Spell Cards are destroyed and sent from the field to the Graveyard by a card effect your opponent controls. Destroy 1 Spell or Trap Card on the field.

Card.Name: Driving Snow
Card.Card_Text: You can activate this card when 1 or more of your Trap Cards are destroyed and sent from the field to the Graveyard by a card effect your opponent controls. Destroy 1 Spell or Trap Card on the field.

Card.Name: Armored Glass
Card.Card_Text: You can activate this card when a monster is equipped with an Equip Card. Negate the effects of all Equip Cards on the field during the turn this card is activated.

Card.Name: World Suppression
Card.Card_Text: You can activate this card when a Field Spell Card is activated. Negate the Field Spell Card during the turn this card is activated.

Card.Name: Mystic Probe
Card.Card_Text: You can activate this card when a Continuous Spell Card is activated. Negate all Continuous Spell Cards during the turn this card is activated.

Card.Name: Metal Detector
Card.Card_Text: You can activate this card when a Continuous Trap Card is activated. Negate all Continuous Trap Cards during the turn this card is activated.

Card.Name: Numinous Healer
Card.Card_Text: You can only activate this card when you take damage to your Life Points. Increase your Life Points by 1000 points. Also, increase your Life Points by 500 points for each "Numinous Healer" card in your Graveyard.

Card.Name: Appropriate
Card.Card_Text: Activate only when your opponent draws a card(s), except during their Draw Phase. Draw 2 cards.

Card.Name: Forced Requisition
Card.Card_Text: You can activate this card when you discard from your hand. After that, each time you discard from your hand, your opponent must also discard the same number of cards from his/her hand.

Card.Name: Minor Goblin Official
Card.Card_Text: You can only activate this card when your opponent's Life Points are 3000 or less. Inflict 500 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points during each of his/her Standby Phases.

Card.Name: Gamble
Card.Card_Text: You can only activate this card when your opponent's hand is 6 or more cards and your hand is 2 or less. Toss a coin and call heads or tails. If you call it right, draw until your hand has 5 cards. If you call it wrong, skip your next turn.

Card.Name: DNA Surgery
Card.Card_Text: Activate this card by declaring 1 Monster Type. All face-up monsters on the field become that Type.

Card.Name: The Regulation of Tribe
Card.Card_Text: Select 1 Type of monster. Any monster of the selected Type cannot attack. To keep this card in effect, you must offer 1 monster from the field as a Tribute at each of your Standby Phases. If you cannot, this card is destroyed.

Card.Name: Backup Soldier
Card.Card_Text: Activate only if there are 5 or more monsters in your Graveyard. Add up to 3 non-Effect Monsters with 1500 or less ATK from your Graveyard to your hand.

Card.Name: Attack and Receive
Card.Card_Text: You can only activate this card when you take damage to your Life Points. Inflict 700 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points. Also, inflict 300 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points for each "Attack and Receive" card in your Graveyard.

Card.Name: Major Riot
Card.Card_Text: You can activate this card when 1 or more of your monsters are returned from the field to your hand. Return all Monster Cards on the field to your respective hands. Both you and your opponent can then Special Summon from your hand the same number of Monster Cards on the field in face-down Defense Position.

Card.Name: Ceasefire
Card.Card_Text: If a face-down Defense Position monster or an Effect Monster is on the field: Change all face-down Defense Position monsters on the field to face-up Defense Position (Flip monsters' effects are not activated at this time), also inflict 500 damage to your opponent for each Effect Monster on the field.

Card.Name: Light of Intervention
Card.Card_Text: While this card is on the field, Monster Cards cannot be Set or flipped face-down. If a Monster Card would be Set, it must be Normal Summoned in face-up Defense Position.

Card.Name: Respect Play
Card.Card_Text: During their respective turns, each player must show their opponent their hand.

Card.Name: Imperial Order
Card.Card_Text: Negate all Spell Card effects on the field. During each of your Standby Phases, pay 700 Life Points or destroy this card.

Card.Name: Skull Invitation
Card.Card_Text: Each time a card(s) is sent to the Graveyard, inflict 300 damage to its owner for each card sent.

Card.Name: Magical Hats
Card.Card_Text: During your opponent's Battle Phase: Choose 2 Spell/Trap Cards from your Deck and 1 monster you control. Special Summon them as Normal Monsters (ATK 0/DEF 0) in face-down Defense Position, Set the chosen monster if it is face-up, and shuffle them on the field. The 2 cards chosen from your Deck are destroyed at the end of the Battle Phase, and cannot remain on the field except during this Battle Phase.

Card.Name: Nobleman of Crossout
Card.Card_Text: Target 1 face-down monster on the field; destroy that target, and if you do, banish it, then, if it was a Flip monster, each player reveals their Main Deck, then banishes all cards from it with that monster's name.

Card.Name: Nobleman of Extermination
Card.Card_Text: Select, destroy, and remove from play 1 face-down Spell or Trap Card. If it was a Trap Card, both players must remove from play all copies of that card from their Decks.

Card.Name: The Shallow Grave
Card.Card_Text: Each player selects a monster in their Graveyard and Special Summons it in face-down Defense Position.

Card.Name: Premature Burial
Card.Card_Text: Activate this card by paying 800 LP, then target 1 monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon that target in Attack Position and equip it with this card. When this card is destroyed, destroy the equipped monster.

Card.Name: Inspection
Card.Card_Text: During your opponent's Standby Phase, you can randomly select 1 card in your opponent's hand and look at it at the cost of 500 Life Points.

Card.Name: Prohibition
Card.Card_Text: Activate by declaring 1 card name. Cards with that name, and their effects, cannot be used. Cards already on the field are not affected (including face-down cards).

Card.Name: Morphing Jar #2
Card.Card_Text: FLIP: Shuffle all monsters on the field into the Deck. Then, each player excavates cards from the top of their Deck, until they excavate the same number of monsters they shuffled into their Main Deck. Special Summon all excavated Level 4 or lower monsters in face-down Defense Position, also send the remaining cards to the Graveyard.

Card.Name: Bubonic Vermin
Card.Card_Text: FLIP: You can Special Summon 1 "Bubonic Vermin" from your Deck in face-down Defense Position. Then shuffle your Deck.

Card.Name: Flame Champion
Card.Card_Text: A warrior protected by a flaming shield that nullifies any attack.

Card.Name: Twin-Headed Fire Dragon
Card.Card_Text: Two dragons fused as one from the effects of the Big Bang.

Card.Name: Darkfire Soldier #1
Card.Card_Text: An explosive expert from a special elite force.

Card.Name: Mr. Volcano
Card.Card_Text: This seemingly mild-mannered creature has an extremely volatile temper.

Card.Name: Darkfire Soldier #2
Card.Card_Text: A warrior who gained immeasurable power from the heart of a volcano.

Card.Name: Kiseitai
Card.Card_Text: When your opponent's monster attacks this card in face-down Defense Position, this card becomes an Equip Spell Card equipped to the attacking monster (No damage calculation is conducted). During each of your opponent's Standby Phases, increase your Life Points by half of the ATK of the monster equipped with this card.

Card.Name: Cyber Falcon
Card.Card_Text: A jet-powered hawk that travels at the speed of sound.

Card.Name: Dark Bat
Card.Card_Text: Bats from the netherworld that use their hyper senses to detect their enemies.

Card.Name: Flying Kamakiri #2
Card.Card_Text: A flying mantis that feeds primarily on insects.

Card.Name: Sky Scout
Card.Card_Text: With eyes like a hawk and a flying speed exceeding Mach 5, this monster is a master of the sky.

Card.Name: Oni Tank T-34
Card.Card_Text: An armored tank possessed by a fiend that will pursue enemies until they're crushed.

Card.Name: Overdrive
Card.Card_Text: An all-terrain armored vehicle armed with a heavy-duty machine gun.

Card.Name: Buster Blader
Card.Card_Text: This card gains 500 ATK for each Dragon-Type monster your opponent controls or is in their Graveyard.

Card.Name: Time Seal
Card.Card_Text: Skip the Draw Phase of your opponent's next turn.

Card.Name: Graverobber
Card.Card_Text: Select 1 Spell Card from your opponent's Graveyard. You can use it as your hand until the end of the turn. If you use it, you take 2000 points of damage.

Card.Name: Gift of The Mystical Elf
Card.Card_Text: Increase your Life Points by 300 points for each monster on the field.

Card.Name: The Eye of Truth
Card.Card_Text: Your opponent must keep their hand revealed. During each of your opponent's Standby Phases, if they have a Spell Card in their hand: They gain 1000 LP.

Card.Name: Dust Tornado
Card.Card_Text: Target 1 Spell/Trap Card your opponent controls; destroy that target, then you can Set 1 Spell/Trap Card from your hand.

Card.Name: Call of the Haunted
Card.Card_Text: Activate this card by targeting 1 monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon that target in Attack Position. When this card leaves the field, destroy that target. When that target is destroyed, destroy this card.

Card.Name: Solomon's Lawbook
Card.Card_Text: Skip your own Standby Phase.

Card.Name: Earthshaker
Card.Card_Text: Select 2 Monster Card Attributes. Your opponent then selects 1 of the 2 Attributes and destroys all face-up monsters with that Attribute on the field.

Card.Name: Enchanted Javelin
Card.Card_Text: Increase your Life Points by the ATK of 1 attacking monster.

Card.Name: Mirror Wall
Card.Card_Text: Each of your opponent's monsters that conducted an attack while this card was face-up on the field has its ATK halved as long as this card remains on the field. During each of your Standby Phases, pay 2000 LP or destroy this card.

Card.Name: Obelisk the Tormentor
Card.Card_Text: Requires 3 Tributes to Normal Summon (cannot be Normal Set). This card's Normal Summon cannot be negated. When Normal Summoned, cards and effects cannot be activated. Cannot be targeted by Spells, Traps, or card effects. During the End Phase, if this card was Special Summoned: Send it to the Graveyard. You can Tribute 2 monsters; destroy all monsters your opponent controls. This card cannot declare an attack the turn this effect is activated.

Card.Name: Slifer the Sky Dragon
Card.Card_Text: Requires 3 Tributes to Normal Summon (cannot be Normal Set). This card's Normal Summon cannot be negated. When Normal Summoned, cards and effects cannot be activated. During the End Phase, if this card was Special Summoned: Send it to the Graveyard. This card gains 1000 ATK and DEF for each card in your hand. When a monster(s) is Normal or Special Summoned to your opponent's side of the field in face-up Attack Position: That monster(s) loses 2000 ATK, then if its ATK has been reduced to 0 as a result, destroy it.

Card.Name: The Winged Dragon of Ra
Card.Card_Text: Cannot be Special Summoned. Requires 3 Tributes to Normal Summon (cannot be Normal Set). This card's Normal Summon cannot be negated. When Normal Summoned, other cards and effects cannot be activated. When this card is Normal Summoned: You can pay Life Points so that you only have 100 left; this card gains ATK and DEF equal to the amount of Life Points paid. You can pay 1000 Life Points, then target 1 monster on the field; destroy that target.

Card.Name: Windstorm of Etaqua
Card.Card_Text: Change the battle positions of all face-up monsters your opponent controls.

Card.Name: Valkyrion the Magna Warrior
Card.Card_Text: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) by Tributing 1 "Alpha The Magnet Warrior", "Beta The Magnet Warrior", and "Gamma The Magnet Warrior" from your hand and/or your side of the field. You can Tribute this card, then target 1 "Alpha The Magnet Warrior", "Beta The Magnet Warrior", and "Gamma The Magnet Warrior" in your Graveyard; Special Summon those targets.

Card.Name: Alligator's Sword Dragon
Card.Card_Text:
Baby Dragon + "Alligator's Sword"
This card can attack your opponent directly if the only face-up monsters they control are EARTH, WATER, or FIRE.

Card.Name: Vorse Raider
Card.Card_Text: This wicked Beast-Warrior does every horrid thing imaginable, and loves it! His axe bears the marks of his countless victims.

Card.Name: Ring of Destruction
Card.Card_Text: During your opponent's turn: Target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls whose ATK is less than or equal to their LP; destroy that face-up monster, and if you do, take damage equal to its original ATK, then inflict damage to your opponent, equal to the damage you took. You can only activate 1 "Ring of Destruction" per turn.

Card.Name: Aqua Chorus
Card.Card_Text: If there are monsters with the same name on the field, increase the ATK and DEF of all of those monsters with the same name by 500 points.

Card.Name: Sebek's Blessing
Card.Card_Text: Activate only when a monster you control has attacked your opponent directly. Gain Life Points equal to the Battle Damage that the monster inflicted to your opponent.

Card.Name: Anti-Spell Fragrance
Card.Card_Text: Both players must Set Spell Cards before activating them, and cannot activate them until their next turn.

Card.Name: Riryoku
Card.Card_Text: Target 2 face-up monsters on the field; halve the ATK of 1 monster, and if you do, add that lost ATK to the other monster. These effects last until the End Phase.

Card.Name: Sword of Dragon's Soul
Card.Card_Text: This card can only be equipped to a Warrior-Type monster. A monster equipped with this card increases its ATK by 700 points. A Dragon-Type monster that battles with the monster equipped with this card is destroyed at the end of the Battle Phase. (Damage Calculation is applied normally.)

Card.Name: Seal of the Ancients
Card.Card_Text: Pay 1000 Life Points. Pick up and see all face-down cards on your opponent's side of the field, then return them to their original positions. (The effects of the face-down cards are not activated.)

Card.Name: Luminous Soldier
Card.Card_Text: If this card battles with a DARK monster, increase the ATK of this card by 500 points during the Damage Step.

Card.Name: King Tiger Wanghu
Card.Card_Text: When a monster(s) with 1400 or less ATK is Normal Summoned or Special Summoned: Destroy those monsters with 1400 or less ATK. This card must be face-up on the field to activate and to resolve this effect.

Card.Name: Command Knight
Card.Card_Text: All Warrior-Type monsters you control gain 400 ATK. If you control another monster, your opponent cannot target this card for an attack.

Card.Name: Wolf Axwielder
Card.Card_Text: Once it has started battle, this monster attacks fiercely and cannot stop.

Card.Name: The Illusory Gentleman
Card.Card_Text: Wearing odd fashions, this gentleman is very fickle. He sometimes saves people and at other times commits crimes.

Card.Name: Patrician of Darkness
Card.Card_Text: You choose the attack targets for your opponent's attacks.

Card.Name: Birdface
Card.Card_Text: When this card is sent to the Graveyard as a result of battle, you can add 1 "Harpie Lady" from your Deck to your hand. Then shuffle your Deck.

Card.Name: Kryuel
Card.Card_Text: When this card is sent to the Graveyard as a result of battle, toss a coin and call it. If you call it right, destroy 1 monster on your opponent's side of the field.

Card.Name: Airknight Parshath
Card.Card_Text: If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing Battle Damage to your opponent. When this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent: Draw 1 card.

Card.Name: Fairy King Truesdale
Card.Card_Text: While this card is in Defense Position, all Plant-Type monsters you control gain 500 ATK and DEF.

Card.Name: Serpentine Princess
Card.Card_Text: If this face-up card is returned from the field to your Deck, select and Special Summon 1 Level 3 or lower monster from your Deck to your side of the field. Then shuffle your Deck.

Card.Name: Maiden of the Aqua
Card.Card_Text: As long as this card remains face-up on the field, the field is treated as "Umi" (however there is no increasing or decreasing of ATK/DEF due to "Umi"'s effect). If there is an active Field Spell Card on the field, this effect is not applied.

Card.Name: Robotic Knight
Card.Card_Text: The Commander of Machine-Types, he serves the Machine King. He is famous for the way he controls his troops.

Card.Name: Thunder Nyan Nyan
Card.Card_Text: If there is a non-LIGHT monster on your side of the field, destroy this face-up card.

Card.Name: Molten Behemoth
Card.Card_Text: A giant born from magma, it attacks with a magma punch.

Card.Name: Twin-Headed Behemoth
Card.Card_Text: During the End Phase, if this card is in the Graveyard because it was destroyed on the field and sent there this turn: You can Special Summon this card, but its ATK and DEF become 1000. You can only use this effect of "Twin-Headed Behemoth" once per Duel.

Card.Name: Injection Fairy Lily
Card.Card_Text: If this card attacks or is attacked, during damage calculation (in either player's turn): You can pay 2000 LP once per battle; this card gains 3000 ATK during that damage calculation only.

Card.Name: Woodland Sprite
Card.Card_Text: Send 1 Equip Card equipped to this card to the Graveyard. Inflict 500 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points.

Card.Name: Arsenal Bug
Card.Card_Text: If you control no other Insect-Type monsters, this card's ATK and DEF become 1000.

Card.Name: Kinetic Soldier
Card.Card_Text: If this card battles a Warrior-Type monster, during damage calculation: This card gains 2000 ATK and DEF during damage calculation only.

Card.Name: Jowls of Dark Demise
Card.Card_Text: FLIP: Take control of 1 monster on your opponent's side of the field until the end of the turn that this card's effect is activated. When the controlled monster attacks, it can attack your opponent's Life Points directly.

Card.Name: Souleater
Card.Card_Text: A living wonder of mystery.

Card.Name: Slate Warrior
Card.Card_Text:
FLIP: This card gains 500 ATK and DEF.
If this card is destroyed by battle: The monster that destroyed it loses 500 ATK and DEF.

Card.Name: Shapesnatch
Card.Card_Text: A bow tie with horrible power, it attacks an opponent by controlling others.

Card.Name: Electromagnetic Bagworm
Card.Card_Text:
FLIP: Target 1 Machine-Type monster your opponent controls; take control of that target until your next End Phase.
If this card is destroyed by battle: The monster that destroyed it loses 500 ATK and DEF.

Card.Name: Timeater
Card.Card_Text: If this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle: Your opponent skips their next Main Phase 1.

Card.Name: Mucus Yolk
Card.Card_Text: This card can attack your opponent's Life Points directly. Each time this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points, increase the ATK of this card by 1000 points during your next Standby Phase. The ATK increase lasts as long as this card remains face-up on the field.

Card.Name: Servant of Catabolism
Card.Card_Text: This monster may attack your opponent's Life Points directly.

Card.Name: Rigorous Reaver
Card.Card_Text:
FLIP: Each player discards 1 card.
If this card is destroyed by battle: The monster that destroyed it loses 500 ATK and DEF.

Card.Name: Moisture Creature
Card.Card_Text: If you Tribute Summon this monster by Tributing 3 monsters on the field, destroy all Spell and Trap Cards on your opponent's side of the field.

Card.Name: Boneheimer
Card.Card_Text: This monster wanders the seas, sucking dry any creatures it may encounter.

Card.Name: Flame Dancer
Card.Card_Text: This monster moves while swinging its burning rope.

Card.Name: Sonic Jammer
Card.Card_Text: FLIP: Your opponent cannot activate any Spell Cards until the end of the End Phase of the next turn.

Card.Name: Gearfried the Iron Knight
Card.Card_Text: When an Equip Card(s) is equipped to this card: Destroy that Equip Card(s).

Card.Name: Humanoid Slime
Card.Card_Text: This slime apparently has some human genes in its genetic makeup.

Card.Name: Worm Drake
Card.Card_Text: Once this monster wraps itself around a victim, there is no escape.

Card.Name: Humanoid Worm Drake
Card.Card_Text: "Worm Drake"+"Humanoid Slime"

Card.Name: Revival Jam
Card.Card_Text: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: You can pay 1000 Life Points; Special Summon it in face-up Defense Position during your next turn's Standby Phase.

Card.Name: Flying Fish
Card.Card_Text: Three wishes are granted to those fortunate enough to see this monster in flight.

Card.Name: Amphibian Beast
Card.Card_Text: On land or in the sea, the speed of this monster is unmatchable.

Card.Name: Rocket Warrior
Card.Card_Text: Cannot be destroyed by battle during your Battle Phase, also you take no battle damage from attacks involving this card. If this card attacks a monster, after damage calculation: That attack target loses 500 ATK until the end of this turn.

Card.Name: The Legendary Fisherman
Card.Card_Text: While "Umi" is on the field, this card is unaffected by Spell effects and cannot be targeted for attacks, but does not prevent your opponent from attacking you directly.

Card.Name: Robolady
Card.Card_Text: A warrior fully covered with metal. It upgrades by fusing with "Roboyarou".

Card.Name: Roboyarou
Card.Card_Text: A warrior fully covered with metal. It upgrades by fusing with "Robolady".

Card.Name: Lightning Conger
Card.Card_Text: This massive eel generates huge charges of electricity and unleashes them as thunderbolts.

Card.Name: Spherous Lady
Card.Card_Text: Many have been deceived by the beauty of this vampire.

Card.Name: Shining Abyss
Card.Card_Text: This monster employs the powers of both Light and Darkness.

Card.Name: Archfiend of Gilfer
Card.Card_Text: When this card is sent to the Graveyard: You can target 1 face-up monster on the field; equip that target with this card. That monster loses 500 ATK while equipped with this card.

Card.Name: Gadget Soldier
Card.Card_Text: A rust-free machine warrior born to battle.

Card.Name: Grand Tiki Elder
Card.Card_Text: A masked monster that wields the most deadly of curses.

Card.Name: The Masked Beast
Card.Card_Text: You can Ritual Summon this card with "Curse of the Masked Beast".

Card.Name: Melchid the Four-Face Beast
Card.Card_Text: This monster has four different masks for four different attacks.

Card.Name: Nuvia the Wicked
Card.Card_Text: If this monster is Normal Summoned, destroy this card. If your opponent controls any monster, decrease the ATK of this card by 200 points for each monster on your opponents side of the field.

Card.Name: Masked Beast Des Gardius
Card.Card_Text: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by Tributing 2 monsters, including at least 1 "Grand Tiki Elder" or "Melchid the Four-Face Beast". When this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard, equip 1 "The Mask of Remnants" from your Deck to 1 monster on the field.

Card.Name: The Mask of Remnants
Card.Card_Text: Shuffle this card into its owner's Deck, OR if this card was put into play by the effect of "Masked Beast Des Gardius", this card is treated as an Equip Card. Control of the equipped monster is switched.

Card.Name: Soul Exchange
Card.Card_Text: Target 1 monster your opponent controls; this turn, if you Tribute a monster, you must Tribute that monster, as if you controlled it. You cannot conduct your Battle Phase the turn you activate this card.

Card.Name: Chosen One
Card.Card_Text: Select 1 Monster Card and 2 non-Monster Cards from your hand. Your opponent randomly selects 1 card among them. If it is a Monster Card, it is Special Summoned and send the remaining 2 cards to the Graveyard. If not, send all the cards to the Graveyard.

Card.Name: Mask of Weakness
Card.Card_Text: Target 1 attacking monster; that target loses 700 ATK until the end of this turn.

Card.Name: Curse of the Masked Beast
Card.Card_Text: This card is used to Ritual Summon "The Masked Beast". You must also Tribute monsters from your hand or field whose total Levels equal 8 or more.

Card.Name: Mask of Dispel
Card.Card_Text: Select 1 face-up Spell Card on the field. The controller of the Spell Card takes 500 points of damage during each of your Standby Phases. When the selected card is removed from the field, destroy this card.

Card.Name: Mask of Restrict
Card.Card_Text: Cards cannot be Tributed.

Card.Name: Mask of the Accursed
Card.Card_Text: The monster equipped with this card cannot attack. The controller of the equipped monster takes 500 points of damage during each of your Standby Phases.

Card.Name: Mask of Brutality
Card.Card_Text: The equipped monster gains 1000 ATK and loses 1000 DEF. During each of your Standby Phases, pay 1000 LP or destroy this card.

Card.Name: Return of the Doomed
Card.Card_Text: Discard 1 Monster Card from your hand to the Graveyard. Return 1 of your monsters destroyed and sent to your Graveyard as a result of battle during this turn to your hand at the end of this turn.

Card.Name: Lightning Blade
Card.Card_Text: Equip only to a Warrior-Type monster. It gains 800 ATK. All WATER monsters lose 500 ATK.

Card.Name: Tornado Wall
Card.Card_Text: Activate only while "Umi" is on the field. While "Umi" is face-up on the field, you take no Battle Damage from attacking monsters. Destroy this card when "Umi" leaves the field.

Card.Name: Infinite Dismissal
Card.Card_Text: Level 3 or lower monsters are destroyed during the End Phase of the turn that they are Normal Summoned or Flip Summoned.

Card.Name: Fairy Box
Card.Card_Text: When your opponent's monster declares an attack: Toss a coin and call it. If you call it right, the attacking monster's ATK becomes 0 until the end of the Battle Phase. During each of your Standby Phases, pay 500 Life Points or destroy this card.

Card.Name: Torrential Tribute
Card.Card_Text: When a monster(s) is Summoned: Destroy all monsters on the field.

Card.Name: Multiplication of Ants
Card.Card_Text: Tribute 1 Insect-Type Monster on your side of the field. Special Summon 2 "Army Ant Tokens" (Insect-Type/EARTH/Level 4/ATK 500/DEF 1200) on your side of the field. The tokens cannot be used as a Tribute for a Tribute Summon.

Card.Name: De-Fusion
Card.Card_Text: Target 1 Fusion Monster on the field; return that target to the Extra Deck, then, if all the Fusion Material Monsters that were used for its Fusion Summon are in your Graveyard, you can Special Summon all of them.

Card.Name: Jam Breeding Machine
Card.Card_Text: During each of your Standby Phases: Special Summon 1 "Slime Token" (Aqua-Type/WATER/Level 1/ATK 500/DEF 500) in Attack Position. You cannot Summon any monsters, except "Slime Tokens" (but you can Set).

Card.Name: Nightmare's Steelcage
Card.Card_Text: This card remains on the field for 2 of your opponent's turns. While this card is face-up on the field, no monsters can attack.

Card.Name: Infinite Cards
Card.Card_Text: There is no limit to the number of cards in players' hands.

Card.Name: Jam Defender
Card.Card_Text: When an opponent's monster declares an attack on a monster you control: You can target 1 "Revival Jam" you control; switch the attack target to that target.

Card.Name: Card of Safe Return
Card.Card_Text: When a monster is Special Summoned from your Graveyard, you can draw 1 card.

Card.Name: Magic Cylinder
Card.Card_Text: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Target the attacking monster; negate the attack, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to its ATK.

Card.Name: Solemn Wishes
Card.Card_Text: Increase your Life Points by 500 points each time you draw a card (or cards).

Card.Name: Burning Land
Card.Card_Text: When this card is activated: If there are any Field Spell Cards on the field, destroy them. During each player's Standby Phase: The turn player takes 500 damage.

Card.Name: Cold Wave
Card.Card_Text: This card can only be activated at the start of Main Phase 1. Until your next turn, you and your opponent cannot play or Set any Spell or Trap Cards.

Card.Name: Fairy Meteor Crush
Card.Card_Text: If the equipped monster attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage to your opponent.

Card.Name: Limiter Removal
Card.Card_Text: Double the ATK of all Machine-Type monsters you controlled at both the activation and resolution of this card, until the end of this turn. During the End Phase, destroy those monsters.

Card.Name: Shift
Card.Card_Text: When your opponent targets exactly 1 monster you control (and no other cards) for an attack, or with a Spell/Trap effect: Target another monster you control that would be an appropriate target; that attack/Spell/Trap now targets the new target.

Card.Name: Insect Imitation
Card.Card_Text: Tribute 1 monster. Special Summon 1 Insect-Type monster from your Deck whose Level is 1 higher than the Tributed monster's.

Card.Name: Dimensionhole
Card.Card_Text: Select 1 monster on your side of the field and remove it from play until your next Standby Phase. While the monster is removed from play, the Monster Card Zone of the selected monster cannot be used.

Card.Name: Magic Drain
Card.Card_Text: When your opponent activates a Spell Card: They can discard 1 Spell Card to negate this card's effect, otherwise negate the activation of their Spell Card, and if you do, destroy it.

Card.Name: Gravity Bind
Card.Card_Text: Level 4 or higher monsters cannot attack.

Card.Name: Shadow of Eyes
Card.Card_Text: When a monster(s) is Set on your opponent's side of the field: Target 1 of those Set monsters; change that Set monster to face-up Attack Position. (Flip Effects are not activated.)

Card.Name: Girochin Kuwagata
Card.Card_Text: Despite its small size, this monster has powerful jaws that can rip metal to shreds.

Card.Name: Hayabusa Knight
Card.Card_Text: This card can make a second attack during each Battle Phase.

Card.Name: Bombardment Beetle
Card.Card_Text: FLIP: Pick up and see 1 face-down Defense Position Monster Card on your opponent's side of the field. If it is an Effect Monster, destroy it (its Flip Effect is not activated), and if the card is not, return it to its original position.

Card.Name: 4-Starred Ladybug of Doom
Card.Card_Text: FLIP: Destroy all Level 4 monsters your opponent controls.

Card.Name: Gradius
Card.Card_Text: A high-performance jet fighter with power capsules for variable attack capabilities.

Card.Name: Vampire Baby
Card.Card_Text: At the end of the Battle Phase, if this card destroyed a monster by battle and sent it to the Graveyard this turn: You can Special Summon that monster to your side of the field.

Card.Name: Mad Sword Beast
Card.Card_Text: If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage to your opponent.

Card.Name: Skull Mariner
Card.Card_Text: A pirate ship that appears out of the mist and sinks any seagoing vessels.

Card.Name: The All-Seeing White Tiger
Card.Card_Text: A proud ruler of the jungle that some fear and others respect.

Card.Name: Goblin Attack Force
Card.Card_Text: If this card attacks, it is changed to Defense Position at the end of the Battle Phase, and its battle position cannot be changed until the End Phase of your next turn.

Card.Name: Island Turtle
Card.Card_Text: A huge turtle that is often mistaken for an island.

Card.Name: Wingweaver
Card.Card_Text: A six-winged fairy who prays for peace and hope.

Card.Name: Science Soldier
Card.Card_Text: Soldiers equipped with state-of-the-art weaponry to face unknown creatures.

Card.Name: Souls of the Forgotten
Card.Card_Text: A wicked spirit created by the hateful souls of those who fell in battle. It grows by assimilating the souls of its enemies.

Card.Name: Dokuroyaiba
Card.Card_Text: A boomerang with brains that will pursue a target to the ends of the earth.

Card.Name: Rain of Mercy
Card.Card_Text: Increase the Life Points of both players by 1000 points.

Card.Name: Monster Recovery
Card.Card_Text: Target 1 monster you control that is owned by you; if that monster is still on the field, shuffle it and your entire hand into the Deck, also, after that, draw cards equal to the number of cards you shuffled from your hand into the Deck by this effect. (You cannot activate this card if you have a card in your hand that is owned by your opponent.)

Card.Name: Type Zero Magic Crusher
Card.Card_Text: Discard 1 Spell Card from your hand to inflict 500 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points.

Card.Name: Yellow Luster Shield
Card.Card_Text: Increase the DEF of all monsters on your side of the field by 300 points.

Card.Name: Creature Swap
Card.Card_Text: Each player chooses 1 monster they control and switches control of those monsters with each other. Those monsters cannot change their battle positions for the rest of this turn.

Card.Name: Spring of Rebirth
Card.Card_Text: Increase your Life Points by 500 points every time monsters return from the field to the owner's hand.

Card.Name: Thousand Knives
Card.Card_Text: If you control "Dark Magician": Target 1 monster your opponent controls; destroy that target.

Card.Name: Mystic Box
Card.Card_Text: Target 1 monster your opponent controls and 1 monster you control; destroy the first target, then give control of the second target to your opponent.

Card.Name: Ground Collapse
Card.Card_Text: Select 2 Monster Card Zones on the field. Neither player can use the selected zones. You cannot select a zone that is occupied by a Monster Card.

Card.Name: Lady Panther
Card.Card_Text: Offer this face-up card as a Tribute to return 1 of your monsters destroyed in battle during this turn to the top of your Deck.

Card.Name: The Unfriendly Amazon
Card.Card_Text: Offer 1 of your monsters on the field as a Tribute (excluding this monster) during each of your Standby Phases. If you cannot, this card is destroyed. Monsters used for a Tribute Summon or that are offered as Tributes due to other cards' effects are excluded.

Card.Name: Amazoness Archer
Card.Card_Text: You can Tribute 2 monsters to inflict 1200 damage to your opponent.

Card.Name: Crimson Sentry
Card.Card_Text: Offer this face-up card as a Tribute to return 1 of your monsters destroyed in battle during this turn to the bottom of your Deck.

Card.Name: Fire Princess
Card.Card_Text: Each time you gain Life Points, inflict 500 damage to your opponent.

Card.Name: Lady Assailant of Flames
Card.Card_Text: FLIP: Remove 3 cards from the top of your Deck from play to inflict 800 points of Direct Damage to your opponent's Life Points.

Card.Name: Fire Sorcerer
Card.Card_Text: FLIP: Randomly select 2 cards from your hand and remove them from play to inflict 800 points of Direct Damage to your opponent's Life Points.

Card.Name: Spirit of the Breeze
Card.Card_Text: As long as this card remains in face-up Attack Position on your side of the field, increase your Life Points by 1000 points during each of your Standby Phases.
